meanings: slap a person[someone in the face] with a smile
A smiling house will have good fortune
You cannot spit on a smiling face, A soft answer turns away wrath

meanings.meaning: If you laugh, blessings will come your way.

vlive.korean: 웃으면 안돼? 불법이야? I can't laugh? Is it illegal? 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 🐭🦒
vlive.english: I can't laugh? Is it illegal?

vlive.korean: 근데 웃으면 안돼! But you can't laugh! 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) HOTLINE #10
[웃음 꾹] [웃으면 안 돼] 미지 너는? [Don't laugh] Miji, you? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 또래들끼리 드라마 찍으면 생기는 일 [다만너] - 비하인드 2
[귀부인 IN MAMA] 웃으면 이제... [Noblewoman IN MAMA] My laughing should be like... 듣기 View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP40. MAMA에 있지!
vlive.english: [Noblewoman IN MAMA] My laughing should be like...

vlive.korean: 아 이거 웃음참기죠? 웃으면 안 되죠? It's a laughter challenge, right? I can't laugh, right? 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스! 다녀왔어요 퇴근길인가요?
vlive.english: It's a laughter challenge, right? I can't laugh, right?

examples.korean: If you laugh, blessings will come your way. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 웃으면 복이 와요. (서양속담, 희망속담) 명언/속담
examples.english: If you laugh, blessings will come your way. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Laughter gives us distance. It allows us to step back from an event, deal with it and then move on. (Bob Newhart) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 웃음은 거리를 둘 수 있게 해준다. 웃으면 문제를 한 발짝 떨어져 바라볼 수 있고, 해결한 다음, 앞으로 나아갈 수 있다. (밥 뉴하트, 희망명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Laughter gives us distance. It allows us to step back from an event, deal with it and then move on. (Bob Newhart) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She has lovely dimples when she smiles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 애는 웃으면 예쁜 보조개가 생긴다. Neungyule
examples.english: She has lovely dimples when she smiles. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Wrinkles gather around his eyes when he smiles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 웃으면 눈가에 주름이 진다 Neungyule
examples.english: Wrinkles gather around his eyes when he smiles. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Wrinkles gather around her eyes when she smiles. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 웃으면 눈가에 주름이 진다 Neungyule
examples.english: Wrinkles gather around her eyes when she smiles. Add to Wordbook
